DIF.Entry_Title: Antarctic Peninsula 100 m Digital Elevation Model Derived from ASTER GDEM

Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Title: Antarctic Peninsula 100 m Digital Elevation Model Derived from ASTER GDEM
Data_Set_Citation.Dataset_Publisher: NSIDC: National Snow and Ice Data Center

Sensor_Name.Long_Name: Advanced Spaceborne Thermal Emission and Reflection Radiometer

Contact_Address.Address: National Snow and Ice Data Center

DIF.Reference:
ASTER GDEM Validation Team, 2009: METI/ERSDAC, NASA/LPDAAC, USGS/EROS. In cooperation with NGA and other collaborators. ASTER GDEM Validation Summary Report, 2009. Available at: https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/lpdaac/media/files/ASTER_GDEM_Validation_Summary_Report.
Cook, A. J., Murray, T., Luckman, A., Vaughan, D. G., and Barrand, N. E. A new 100-m Digital Elevation Model of the Antarctic Peninsula derived from ASTER Global DEM: methods and accuracy assessment, Earth Syst. Sci. Data, 4, 129-142, doi:10.5194. Accessed 4-129-2012.
Cziferszky, A., Fleming, A., and Fox, A. 2010. An Assessment of ASTER Elevation Data ove Glaciated Terrain on Pourquoi Pas Island, Antarctic Peninsula, in: Elevation Models for Geoscience, edited by: Gibbs, S., Geological Society Special Publications.
Hutchinson, M. F. 1989. A new Procedure for Gridding Elevation and Stream Line Data with Automatic Removal of Spurious Pits, J. Hydrol., 106, 211-232, 10.1016/0022-1694(89)90073-5.
Hvidegaard, S. M., Sorensen, L. S., and Forsberg, R. 2012. ASTER GDEM Validation Using LiDAR Data over Coastal Regions of Greenland, Remote Sens. Lett., 3, 85-91, 10.1080/01431161.2010.527389.
Kaab, A., Huggel, C., Paul, F., Wessels, R., Raup, B., Kieffer, H., and Kargel, J. S. 2002. Glacier Monitoring from ASTER Imagery: Accuracy and Applications, EARSeL eProceedings No.2, 43-53.
Liu, H. X., Jezek, K. C., and Li, B. 1999. Development of Antarctic DEM by Integrating Cartographic and Remotely Sensed Data: A GIS-based Approach, Journal of Geophysical Research, 104, 23199-23213. Rees, W. G.: Assessment of ASTER Global Digital Elevation Model Data for Arctic Research, Polar Rec., 48, 31-39, 10.1017/s0032247411000325, 2012.
Reuter, H. I., Nelson, A., Strobl, P., Mehl, W., Jarvis, A., and Ieee. 2009. A First Assessment of ASTER GDEM Tiles for Absolute Accuracy, Relative Accuracy and Terrain Parameters, 2009. Ieee International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium, Vols 1-5, IEEE, New York, 3665-3668.

Summary.Abstract: This data set provides a 100 meter resolution surface topography Digital Elevation Model (DEM) of the Antarctic Peninsula. The DEM is based on Advanced Spaceborne Thermal Emission and Reflection Radiometer (ASTER) Global Digital Elevation Model (GDEM) data.

DIF.DIF_Revision_History: 2012-10-18, P.I. requested title change and added a new reference. 2012-10-18, Changed title per PIs request. 2013-03-04, Deann Miller, Updated citation fixing the author string. 2012-09-26, Changed publisher to NSIDC:National Snow and Ice Data Center 2012-10-18, Still trying to fix reference problem. 2012-10-18, removed a colon from citation. 2015-07-21, Michon Scott, Added keyword as part of Drupal migration. 2013-03-20, Brandon Pearce, Added DOI 2012-04-30, Transferred from mddb dataset_citation.release_date 2012-05-03, Deann Miller, New data set. 2012-05-03, Deann Miller, New data set. 2012-05-03, Deann Miller, republishing: special character had meant that my references didn't show up despite saving them, so added references. also added doi number to reference. 2012-05-11, Deann Miller, added publisher 2012-07-26, Deann Miller, added publisher 2012-09-13, Deann Miller, Added info about the RMSE value to the summary. 2012-09-14, Deann Miller, Added "original" to sentence "The original GDEM data are accurate for coastal regions..." 2015-09-28, Deann Miller, Removed additional authors and technical contacts per PI.
